basics.name: Coby Preza
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Computer technician of the TecHub department.
highlights: Performed computer diagnostics, system checks, data transfers, and component replacements
Assisted customers in finding Apple products based on performance, compatibility, and usage
Managed interdepartmental orders, coordinating inventory flow and fulfillment accuracy across multiple teams
Delivered customer-facing technical consultations, translating complex concepts into clear, user-friendly explanations
Carried out core retail operations including customer service, point-of-sale transactions, inventory resupply, and asset organization

volunteer.organization: Interact Club at Pearl City High School
volunteer.summary: Led a comittee that assisted in member participation and retention
highlights: Provided a welcoming and inclusive environment to a club consisting of 80+ members.
Volunteered 25+ hours in a community service projects supporting local beaches, schools, and organizations

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Top 200
awards.summary: My team won top 200 in 2025.  See my portfolio site for more details.
